mapper.select:
select
from t_wash_order w left join t_user u on w.washer_id = u.id left join t_auto a on w.auto_id = a.id left join t_org o on w.org_id = o.id left join t_region r on w.region_id = r.id left join t_pay p on p.order_id = w.id where w.order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
